name: Person Do Thing
description:
Official app for Person Do Thing, the game of simple words and big ideas! Using only the 36 basic words in the PDT wordbank (such as Person, Do, Thing, Go, Place), describe a target word for your friends to guess. Person Do Thing will test your creativity to the limits, and have you using words in ways you can't imagine. Person do thing.... person feel good!

This free app has full functionality and 150+ target words. True obsessives will love Person Do Thing More, the extension app with 500+ new target words for days/weeks/months more fun:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/person-do-thing-more/id1291784719
